Articles.Content:
I'm back playing after a few months break. Been a KSP fan long enough to have racked up an embarrassing 1,200+ hours according to steam. My first impression of 1.0 are really good. I like the way that this game has matured. Great job Squad. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I still miss the launch tower and old SAS system. Hopefully there are still mods for that.

Welcome back. I returned last month after a few-month break myself, and I've had the same impressions of 1.0: the game has come a long way. I hope you continue to enjoy it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Thanks Spock, happy Kerbaling to you too. Keep the pointy end pointed towards space. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
